net.varkhan.base.containers.array
Class LongArrays

java.lang.Object
  net.varkhan.base.containers.array.LongArrays

public class LongArrays
extends java.lang.Object

Static long arrays manipulation utilities.

Utilities for manipulating arrays of longs.

Method Detail

equals

public static boolean equals(long[] array1,
                             long[] array2)
Indicates whether two long arrays are equal.

Parameters:
array1 - the first array
array2 - the second array
Returns:
true iff the arrays are either both null or have the same number of elements, and the values of elements in the same positions are equal

indexOf

public static int indexOf(long item,
                          long... array)
Returns the position of the first occurrence of a value inside an array.

Parameters:
item - the value to search for
array - the array to search
Returns:
-1 if item was not found in array, the position of the first element of the array equal to item

indexOf

public static int indexOf(long[] array,
                          int pos,
                          long[] sub)
Returns the position of the first occurrence of an array as a subsequence of an other array.

Parameters:
array - the array
pos - the starting point in the array
sub - the subsequence to find
Returns:
the smallest index idx greater than pos such that the elements of array starting at idx are exactly those of sub (-1 is returned if sub is not a subsequence of array)

searchInc

public static int searchInc(long[] ary,
                            int inf,
                            int sup,
                            long key)
Finds an object in a sorted array, in ascending order.

Parameters:
ary - the sorted array
inf - the minimum index
sup - the maximum index
key - the value to search for
Returns:
the key position in the array, or -(inspos+1), where inspos is the index of the first value in the array bigger than key

searchDec

public static int searchDec(long[] ary,
                            int inf,
                            int sup,
                            long key)
Finds an object in a sorted array, in descending order.

Parameters:
ary - the sorted array
inf - the minimum index
sup - the maximum index
key - the value to search for
Returns:
the key position in the array, or -(inspos+1), where inspos is the index of the first value in the array bigger than key

unionInc

public static long[] unionInc(long[] ary1,
                              int beg1,
                              int len1,
                              long[] ary2,
                              int beg2,
                              int len2)
Computes the union of segments in two sorted arrays, in ascending order.

Parameters:
ary1 - the first sorted array
beg1 - the start position of the first segment
len1 - the length of the first segment
ary2 - the second sorted array
beg2 - the start position of the second segment
len2 - the length of the second segment
Returns:
the union of the two segments, with duplicates removed

len1 - the length of the first segment
ary2 - the second sorted array
beg2 - the start position of the second segment
len2 - the length of the second segment
Returns:
the union of the two segments, with duplicates removed

ary2 - the second sorted array
beg2 - the start position of the second segment
len2 - the length of the second segment
Returns:

Computes the intersection of segments in two sorted arrays, in descending order.

Parameters:

beg1 - the start position of the first segment
len1 - the length of the first segment
ary2 - the second sorted array
beg2 - the start position of the second segment
len2 - the length of the second segment
Returns:
the intersection of the two segments, with duplicates removed

append

public static long[] append(long[] array,
                            long... elems)
Append elements to an array.

Parameters:
array - the array to append to
elems - the elements to append
Returns:
an array of longs containing all the elements of array followed by all the elements in elems

prepend

public static long[] prepend(long[] array,
                             long... elems)
Prepend elements to an array.

Parameters:
array - the array to prepend to
elems - the elements to prepend
Returns:
an array of longs containing all the elements in elems followed by all the elements of array

concat

public static long[] concat(long[] array,
                            long[]... arrays)
Concatenates several arrays.

Parameters:
array - the first array to append to
arrays - the arrays to append
Returns:
an array of longs containing all the elements in the arrays, in order

subarray

public static long[] subarray(long[] array,
                              int beg,
                              int end)
Returns a segment of an array.

Parameters:
array - the source array
beg - the begining position of the segment, inclusive
end - the ending position of the segment, exclusive
Returns:
an array of longs, of length end-beg, and containing all the elements between positions beg, inclusive, and end, exclusive, of the original array

container

public static LongContainer container(long... values)
Returns an immutable container backed by an array.

Parameters:
values - the array of values for the container
Returns:
a container holding the elements of the array, in order
